remarks: The line going through points ` X ` and ` Y ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Mar-2019.)
statement:
tglngval.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tglngval.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
tglngval.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tglngval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tglngval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
tglngval.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) $.
tglngval.z $e |- ( ph -> X =/= Y ) $.
tglngval $p |- ( ph -> ( X L Y ) = { z e. P | ( z e. ( X I Y ) \/ X e. ( z I Y ) \/ Y e. ( X I z ) ) } ) $.
$d G z $.
$d I z $.
$d P z $.
$d X z $.
$d Y z $.
$d ph z $.
